successes.title: Time of EVE: The Movie on Blu-ray
successes.description: Launch the international Blu-ray release of Time of EVE: The Movie!

Pledges.description: Just want to show your love? This is for you. We'll give you special thanks on the official Time of EVE facebook page, and digital file of the android ring/halo. Remember, you're always welcome at the Time of EVE.
40-page art book, 8 character postcards, digital art package (background art, storyboard art, and character art), digital halo, and special thanks on our facebook page!
Time of EVE Official Fan Book! + all of the above!
Time of EVE Official Fan Book!!!

Blu-ray of Time of EVE: The Movie with English subtitles and bonus features, 40-page art book, 8 character cards, digital art package (background art, storyboard art, and character art), digital halo, and special thanks on our facebook page.
Time of EVE Official Fan Book + $55 tier rewards!

All of the above +
Your name will be included in the special thanks listing in the Blu-ray insert, plus a limited-edition illustration of Nagi (A4 size).
Time of EVE coffee cup/saucer + $100 tier rewards!
Time of EVE coffee cup/saucer + canister + $100 tier rewards!
Time of EVE coffee cup/saucer + canister + $100 tier rewards! Lot #2!
Time of EVE coffee cup/saucer + canister + $100 tier rewards! Lot #3!
Time of EVE coffee cup/saucer + canister + $100 tier rewards! Lot #4!
Time of EVE coffee cup/saucer + canister + $100 tier rewards! Lot #5!

Original character drawing of Nagi by Time of EVE's character design Ryusuke Chayama, signed and numbered by Chayama and director Yasuhiro Yoshiura. High quality digital print (A4 size), numbered 1 through 10 (based on the order in which the pledges come in). Chayama will draw this illustration exclusively for the Kickstarter campaign! Plus, you get everything from the $100 reward!

Original drawing of your favorite character by Time of EVE's character designer Ryusuke Chayama, signed by Chayama and director Yasuhiro Yoshiura. These drawings will be done by Chayama for your specific order! Plus, you get everything in the $100 reward!

Original set of the Japanese scripts signed by director Yasuhiro Yoshiura. 3 soft-bound volumes. This is the last remaining complete set of the scripts. Quite frankly, we will be a little relieved if this goes unclaimed... You get everything from the $100 reward!
Nagi original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura, + $100 tier rewards.
Rina & Koji original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Rikuo & Masaki (no. 1) original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Rikuo original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Shimei original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Chie original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Akiko & Sammy original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Setoro original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Akiko original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
2 Time of EVE cafe interior sketches by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
Rikuo & Masaki (no. 2) original character sketch by Yasuhiro Yoshiura + $100 tier rewards.
